creator: Altametrics
descriptionHtml:
The Altametrics Inventory Pro mobile application, bundled with easy-to-use features to manage inventory, gives manager the freedom to manage inventory via handheld devices. Application facilitates performing all inventory-related tasks ranging from taking inventory to tracking and controlling food cost by keeping an eye on Variance in Actual vs. Theo. usage of items.

Features

• Take inventory of items anytime.
• Items, sorted by categories and storage locations, to ease process of taking inventory.
• Generate inventory reports for an insight to key information regarding inventory levels.
• Control surplus investment in inventory as well as variance between Actual vs. Theo. usage of items.
• Establish a real-time sync with the Inventory module in eRestaurant.
• Advanced Search options to find items from the whole list.
descriptionShort: Application facilitates manager to accomplish inventory-related tasks on the go.
